batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (lower(process.name) = lower('/bin/launchctl') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('unload')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.objective-see.lulu.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.objective-see.blockblock.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.google.santad.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.carbonblack.defense.daemon.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.carbonblack.daemon.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('at.obdev.littlesnitchd.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.tenablesecurity.nessusagent.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.opendns.osx.roamingclientconfigupdater.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.crowdstrike.falcond.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('com.crowdstrike.userdaemon.plist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osquery')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('filebeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('auditbeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('packetbeat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('td-agent'))) OR lower(process.name) = lower('/usr/sbin/spctl') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disable'))))
